documentation.description: Retrieves configuration information for a trained inference model.

model_id.description: The ID of the trained models to fetch

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no trained models. (This includes `_all` string or when no trained models have been specified)

include.description: A comma-separate list of fields to optionally include. Valid options are 'definition' and 'total_feature_importance'. Default is none.

include_model_definition.description: Should the full model definition be included in the results. These definitions can be large. So be cautious when including them. Defaults to false.

decompress_definition.description: Should the model definition be decompressed into valid JSON or returned in a custom compressed format. Defaults to true.

from.description: skips a number of trained models

size.description: specifies a max number of trained models to get

tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags that the model must have.

exclude_generated.description: Omits fields that are illegal to set on model PUT
